title: cmake: failing build on OSX 10.11 (clang-8.0 and gcc-6.3.0)
body:
Spack fails to build CMAKE-3.7.2 on OSX10.11.  I confirmed this happens with clang-8.00 and gcc-6.3.0.  I think it is not compiler specific.
```
[ 49%] Building C object Utilities/cmcurl/lib/CMakeFiles/cmcurl.dir/vtls/darwinssl.c.o
[ 49%] Building C object Utilities/cmcurl/lib/CMakeFiles/cmcurl.dir/vtls/gskit.c.o
```
